Question: EZ Factory B.V. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
EZ Factory B.V.

Product: EZ-GO Platform

- Digitizes checklists, work instructions, and audits
- Offers digital signatures for task completion
- Enhances with new functionalities such as Skills management, Data API, and Factory Feed
- Supports autonomous maintenance and continuous improvement
- Represents the Netherlands at CES 2024
- Available at Venetian Expo, Level 1, Hall G, Stand 62100 RVO/Netherlands Enterprise Agency
Summary_cn:
EZ Factory B.V.

产品：EZ-GO平台

- 数字化检查表、工作指导和审核
- 提供任务完成的数字签名
- 增强功能，如技能管理、数据API和工厂动态
- 支持自主维护和持续改进
- 代表荷兰参加2024年CES
- 在威尼斯博览会，1楼，G厅，62100展位，RVO/荷兰企业局
